ygData.subject: Re: Opinions and suggestions on my monk
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I actually do think that intelligence is important for a rogue, but that s another story. . . Neat backstory for your character; maybe add something
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I actually do think that intelligence is
important for a rogue, but that's another story. . . Neat
backstory for your character; maybe add something about
searching for your father to convince him of the error of
his ways, so your mother could return from the plane
of Air (if one returns from such places; remember,
I've very new here!)? Or, he has discovered your
existence, and you're on the run from him? I'm always
looking for reasons why people go adventuring. Keep us
posted.
